cynthiaestock: The Plover by Brian Doyle... an unexpected pleasure, bought at the dollar store at Christmas ❤️as my boyfriend so eloquently stated”My Mom gave me this book as part of our Dollar Store gift-exchange at Christmas and I wasn't at all prepared for how transcendent it would be. A simple tale of a man who sails west from Oregon with the intention of leaving all semblance of humanity behind... and discovers everything that humanity has to offer. Beautiful, lyrical, funny and profound without trying to be any of those things, it is written with such an uncompromising joy that it washes over you and into you like only the best tales can. By the end I had tears in my eyes for a journey now over and renewed aspirations for my own, to strike out into the unknown to discover my soul in the wondrous natural beauty of our world. Magical. 😁👍”
